     Sep 6, 2016 
 
     Karnalyte Resources Inc. Announces Successful Commissioning Of  Brine Production Phase Of Optimization Program 
 
     KARNALYTE RESOURCES INC. ANNOUNCES SUCCESSFUL COMMISSIONING OF BRINE PRODUCTION PHASE OF OPTIMIZATION PROGRAM Not for distribution to U.S. news wire services or dissemination in the United States. SASKATOON, SK (CNW– SEPTEMBER 6, 2016) – Karnalyte Resources Inc. ("Karnalyte" or the "Company") (TSX: KRN) is pleased to announce the successful commissioning of the second phase of the optimization program (the “Brine ...      Aug 29, 2016 
 
     Karnalyte Resources Inc. – Director Elections 
 
     Karnalyte Resources Inc. - Director Elections Saskatoon, SK (August 29, 2016) – Karnalyte Resources Inc. ("Karnalyte" or the "Corporation") (TSX: KRN), confirms that all resolutions put to shareholders at Karnalyte's annual and special meeting of shareholders (the "Meeting") held on August 26, 2016 were duly passed, including the fixing of the number of directors at six, the election of directors, ...
